mapper.select: SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,s2.dict_fldname AS staff_flddeptname,s3.dict_fldname AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate as staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcontent FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 0 order by s1.staff_fldid

SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,s2.dict_fldname AS staff_flddeptname,s3.dict_fldname AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcontent FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 0 and s1.staff_fldpersoncode = #{param}
select * from ssh_roomset where roomset_fldroomcode=#{param1} and roomset_fldbuildname=#{param2}
